meanings.definition: The skill or art of being a general in the military.
meanings.sent1: His generalship in leading the troops to victory was commendable.
meanings.sent2: The general's generalship was evident in the strategic placement of troops.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed great generalship in planning how to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her generalship on the soccer field was like a master chess player.
meanings.sent5: The generalship of the captain guided the ship safely through the storm.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being a general in command.
meanings.sent1: The generalship of the leader inspired confidence in the troops.
meanings.sent2: His natural generalship made him a respected military commander.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's generalship in gathering nuts was impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her generalship in managing the project was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The generalship of the teacher kept the classroom organized and focused.
